FuckPxndaForLifee
Who are you?
Are you too scared to reveal yourself?
With all your dead memes, it clearly shows you are outdated.
Also, the fact you aren't giving any actual proof here shows that you are probably that type of person who would nuke hosts to benefit themselves. (badsk reference)
Also, we wouldn't be stupid for thinking you are badsk, because people assume.
The fact you know who badsk is really suspicious.
Just give "valid" and "non-edited" evidence here.
You are currently exposing yourself under a mask of a "FuckPxndaForLifee" username because you are too scared to ruin your reputation more than how bad it already is.
Also, if you reply back with nothing or a message trying to show how bad I am (just because I insulted you or something), that still wouldn't be proof.
